title: Executive Order 5084-Making Lessie L. Schaefer Eligible for Examination Without Regard to Age
content: The maximum age limit of fifty years for admission to the general clerical examination in the Eleventh United States Civil Service District which closes April 5, 1929, is hereby waived to permit the examination of Mrs. Lessie L. Schaefer of Pendleton, Oregon.
It is stated that Mrs. Schaefer is in good health, brilliant, thoroughly fitted and experienced in clerical work, and that it is necessary that she be self-supporting.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5084-Making Lessie L. Schaefer Eligible for Examination Without Regard to Age Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360800
